author: AETerry
title: Duplo Creative Building Review
review:
This set of blocks was given to my daughter as a christmas gift and she's loved it, providing her many hours of enjoyment and fun building different things, towers, castles, cars, and so on.

 

The only down side is that there are stickers for eyes to be placed on the blocks. Not something I'd have put in a box set like this.

 

Aside from that, the box the blocks come in is great for storage of the Duplos after play and keeping everything all together. It is a great gift and was well recieved.
